detailed_findings.title: Open SSH Service
detailed_findings.solution: Use SSH key authentication and disable root login

detailed_findings.title: SSH Service Exposed
detailed_findings.description: SSH service is accessible from network
detailed_findings.solution: Restrict SSH access to trusted IPs and use key authentication

detailed_findings.title: Open HTTP Service
detailed_findings.solution: Ensure web server is properly secured

detailed_findings.title: Open HTTPS Service
detailed_findings.solution: Use HTTPS with proper TLS configuration

detailed_findings.title: Open HTTP-PROXY Service
detailed_findings.solution: Review if this service needs to be publicly accessible

detailed_findings.title: Open HTTPS-ALT Service
detailed_findings.solution: Review if this service needs to be publicly accessible
